pain_point: Marketing teams struggle with time-consuming tasks such as data analysis, reporting, and optimization, which can hinder efficiency and effectiveness.
concept_description: A satirical documentary approach that follows a marketer navigating a day completely devoid of automation—a dramatic exploration of inefficiencies that ends warm and uplifting when Epiminds enters the scene.
concept_hook: An alarm blaring as the marketer wakes up late to a chaotic scene in the office filled with basic tools losing functionality.

scenes.visual: A messy office space filled with spreadsheets, calculators, and crumpled papers. An alarm blaring loudly on a desk. Frantic movements as a marketer jumps out of bed, disheveled and panicked.
scenes.camera: Static shot focused on the alarm clock and wider shot revealing the chaotic office behind it
scenes.action: Look around in disbelief at the chaotic office setup
scenes.dialogue: Oh no! I'm late for the meeting!
scenes.notes_for_model: Capture the chaotic energy of a late morning in a marketer's life.

scenes.visual: Close-ups of the marketer struggling to analyze data manually with piles of spreadsheets and confusion on their face. The marketer attempts to send reports but keeps running into printer jams and error messages.
scenes.camera: Close-ups on expressions and frustration, interspersed with wider shots of desks and tools malfunctioning
scenes.action: Frantically trying to reproduce insights manually, overwhelmed and visibly distressed.
scenes.dialogue: Why is this taking so long? I should have had those insights ready!
scenes.notes_for_model: The focus should be on the tension and stress of handling marketing tasks without automation.

scenes.visual: Dramatic shift to a clean, organized workspace with modern technology. Show the marketer exploring Epiminds on their laptop, smiles begin to replace frowns as automation highlights insights onscreen.
scenes.camera: Dramatic zoom out as workspace transforms and the character regains composure
scenes.action: Engaging with Epiminds interface, highlighting features like automated reporting and insights generation.
scenes.dialogue: Wait a minute, what if I had Epiminds? This would be a whole lot easier!
scenes.notes_for_model: Highlight the transformation and synergy between the marketer and Epiminds.

scenes.visual: The marketer now confidently leading a virtual meeting, discussing results, with clear screens and personalities joining on video conferencing. The environment is vibrant and collaborative.
scenes.camera: Panning out to wide angle showing several team members engaged and satisfied
scenes.action: Wrapping up the call with happy employees celebrating success.
scenes.dialogue: With Epiminds, we’ve just unlocked our team’s potential!
scenes.notes_for_model: Convey a sense of community and success through teamwork.

all_concepts.title: The Marketing Time Traveler
all_concepts.description: A humorous take where a marketing professional uses a time-travel device to go back 10 minutes, trying to automate tasks with Epiminds - only to keep encountering the same struggle until they realize the solution lies in Epiminds' automation capabilities.

all_concepts.title: AI Agents Assemble!
all_concepts.description: A superhero-themed animated short where AI agents personified as quirky characters save marketers from mundane tasks, fighting off the evil 'Time Suckers' in a dramatic yet comic visual style.

all_concepts.title: Ten Tasks, One Click
all_concepts.description: A 'challenge' style video showcasing a marketer trying to complete 10 marketing tasks in under a minute, celebrating each successful automation by showcasing how Epiminds manages each step effortlessly.

all_concepts.title: A Day Without Automation
all_concepts.description: A satirical documentary approach that follows a marketer navigating a day completely devoid of automation—a dramatic exploration of inefficiencies that ends warm and uplifting when Epiminds enters the scene.

all_concepts.title: Speak to the AI! Challenge
all_concepts.description: Inviting the audience to challenge their marketing AI by submitting absurd marketing prompts - 'What happens when I dare the AI to write my next blog post in Shakespearean English?'

all_concepts.title: The Hopscotch Hustle
all_concepts.description: Marketers engaging in a hopscotch game with each square representing a marketing task, demonstrating how each (frustrating) task can be automated with just one footstep on the 'Epiminds' square.

all_concepts.title: The Emoji Report Card
all_concepts.description: A creative breakdown of how marketers can use emojis to represent successes and struggles in marketing tasks, converging into how Epiminds takes away pain points for straight-A results.

all_concepts.title: Epic Fail to Art of Success
all_concepts.description: Real marketers share their most cringe-inducing marketing fails only to compare those disasters to their triumphs with Epiminds integration, creating laughter and relatability.

pain_point: Tracking and analyzing brand visibility, position, and sentiment on AI search platforms is challenging, making it difficult for brands to understand their performance and improve their rankings.
concept_description: A fun and engaging orchestral composition where different AI features play instruments, illustrating how Peec AI harmoniously brings together brand performance metrics. Each instrument represents different data points or insights, creating a symphony of brand visibility.
concept_hook: An AI conductor dramatically cues an orchestra, showing algorithmic charts transforming into musical notes.

scenes.visual: A dramatic conductor, a stylized AI character made of circuit patterns, stands on a podium in front of an orchestra, with screens swirling algorithmic charts and fluctuating brand metrics around them.
scenes.camera: Wide shot focusing on the conductor and the orchestra.
scenes.action: The conductor raises their wand, instantly transforming the charts into vibrant musical notes flying through the air.
scenes.dialogue: Welcome to the world of AI Search!
scenes.notes_for_model: Ensure the conductor is animated and expressive, emphasizing the magic of transformation.

scenes.visual: Cut to close-up shots of marketing professionals looking frustrated as they review confusing reports filled with complex data and numbers.
scenes.camera: Quick cuts between furrowed brows and confused expressions of several marketers staring at spreadsheets.
scenes.action: Marketers flip pages and shake their heads, overwhelmed.
scenes.dialogue: Tracking brand performance on AI search is a nightmare!
scenes.notes_for_model: Highlight expressions of frustration clearly, showing the chaos of unorganized data.

scenes.visual: Return to the AI conductor, who waves their wand again, and the orchestra magically reorganizes into the harmonious flow of insights and metrics flowing through each instrument.
scenes.camera: Close-up on instruments, each providing visual indicators of various brand metrics like visibility, sentiment score, etc.
scenes.action: Each instrument starts playing, with each note representing different insights that heighten the orchestral performance.
scenes.dialogue: With Peec AI, get straightforward metrics to optimize your strategy!
scenes.on_screen_text: Your Insights, Made Easy with Peec AI!
scenes.notes_for_model: Depict each instrument depicting a specific data point, fostering a sense of clarity and harmony.

scenes.visual: The conductor looking directly at the audience with a confident smile as the orchestra concludes a powerful crescendo.
scenes.camera: Zoom in on the conductor while fading background performing metrics graphs.
scenes.action: The screen transitions to a branded logo of Peec AI and website URL.
scenes.dialogue: Join us and harmonize your brand’s visibility!
scenes.notes_for_model: Ensure the Call-To-Action is clear and the logo is brightly displayed against a vibrant backdrop.

all_concepts.title: The AI Search Orchestra
all_concepts.description: A fun and engaging orchestral composition where different AI features play instruments, illustrating how Peec AI harmoniously brings together brand performance metrics. Each instrument represents different data points or insights, creating a symphony of brand visibility.

all_concepts.title: Sentiment Survival Guide
all_concepts.description: A tongue-in-cheek 'reality show' format that takes viewers through the 'rough terrain' of brand sentiment tracking. Scene highlighted by humorous portrayals of marketers confronting extreme situations stemming from poor AI visibility.

all_concepts.title: The Ghost of Brand Performance Past
all_concepts.description: A horror-themed narrative where a marketer is haunted by past missed metrics and lost visibility because they didn't use Peec AI, leading to hair-raising stats coming to life—until Peec AI saves them.

all_concepts.title: AI Search Influencer Interviews
all_concepts.description: Create mock interviews with a quirky AI persona that represents AI search platforms, revealing how Peec AI helps brands boost visibility. The AI reveals industry insider secrets that marketers can use to psychoanalyze their data trends.

all_concepts.title: The Real Ranking Reality Check
all_concepts.description: Channel the style of reality game shows, where brands compete for rankings live with unpredictable AI challenges, showcasing how Peec AI elevates them to the top—filled with comic antics.

all_concepts.title: Categories Unboxed
all_concepts.description: Showcase popular AI niches in a video unboxing style, where viewers learn how Peec AI helps brands dominate in following categories seamlessly. Surprise elements reveal hidden opportunities

all_concepts.title: Emoji Day in the Life of a Brand
all_concepts.description: A day narrated through emojis representing the highs and lows experienced by a brand as it tracks performance. A contrasting vibe explores success by using Peec AI, conveyed entirely through emoticons—fresh and relatable for Gen-Z audience.

all_concepts.title: AI Buzzword Bingo Gone Wild
all_concepts.description: A fast-paced game show style clip where marketers play multiple rounds of bingo over ridiculous AI jargon until Peec AI reveals the hyper-productive terms back into usable, understandable insights that drive action.

pain_point: Slow and inefficient code review processes that create bottlenecks in merging pull requests (PRs) and maintaining code quality.
concept_description: An enchanting video where developers communicate with an AI, treating it as a wise old wizard in a digital realm. Each 'spell' cast reduces time and fuzziness on PRs, with humorous conversations about the 'magic of efficiency.'
concept_hook: A glowing, mystical computer screen with an old wizard whispering code solutions, captivating the viewer right from the start.

scenes.visual: A dimly lit room filled with books and mystical artifacts. A glowing, mystical computer screen illuminates the scene, revealing an old wizard with a long beard, dressed in a robe adorned with symbols. He leans in towards the screen, with swirling lights around him.
scenes.camera: Zoom in on the wizard and computer screen
scenes.action: The wizard whispers spells while snippets of code float around the screen.
scenes.dialogue: "Ah, behold the dance of code! Let’s conjure some magic for your reviews!"
scenes.on_screen_text: The Code Whisperer: Your AI for faster code reviews!
scenes.notes_for_model: Wizard should have a warm and engaging demeanor, spectators should feel enchanted.

scenes.visual: A chaotic developer workspace filled with stacks of papers, multiple monitors showing an endless list of pull requests. Developers look stressed out while staring at their screens with furrowed brows.
scenes.camera: Pan across the cluttered workspace and zoom in on a worried developer.
scenes.action: Developers sigh, frustrated by the slow review process as a clock ticks loudly in the background.
scenes.dialogue: "Why isn't this PR merging yet? This is just way too slow!"

audio.music: Background music fades to a slower, more tense rhythm

scenes.notes_for_model: Create a sense of frustration and urgency.

scenes.visual: The mystical computer screen lights up as the wizard casts spells, and the chaotic workspace gradually transforms into an organized, calm environment with happy developers receiving instant feedback.
scenes.camera: Move in closer to the screen and show the developers smiling as they view their monitors.
scenes.action: With each spell the wizard casts, code becomes clearer and LPs merge smoothly.
scenes.dialogue: "With my magic, I’ll analyze code and enforce quality in a blink! 4x faster reviews!"

audio.sfx: magical chimes as spells are cast

scenes.notes_for_model: Developers should visibly relax and be delighted at the transformation.

scenes.visual: Cut back to the wizard, now smiling as he gestures toward a glowing 'Get Started' button on the computer screen.
scenes.camera: Static close-up shot of the wizard pointing,
scenes.action: The screen shows a ready-to-join button and join sign-up.
scenes.dialogue: "Unlock the magic of efficient code reviews! Try Cubic today!"

audio.sfx: whoosh sound during the button reveal

scenes.notes_for_model: Ensure the wizard has an inviting and friendly expression, inspiring interest.

all_concepts.title: The Code Whisperer
all_concepts.description: An enchanting video where developers communicate with an AI, treating it as a wise old wizard in a digital realm. Each 'spell' cast reduces time and fuzziness on PRs, with humorous conversations about the 'magic of efficiency.'

all_concepts.title: PR Face-Off: Speed Challenge
all_concepts.description: Two teams of developers race against time, one using tradition and the other with the AI-powered code review tool. Devised as a sports commentary setup, viewers will witness PR merging excitement like a thrilling match, complete with ‘play-by-play’ commentary.

all_concepts.title: Anecdote to Algorithm
all_concepts.description: A comedic series of anecdotes showcasing funny and outrageous PR fails before introduction of the AI tool, culminating in an exaggerated flip to amazing success and speed with it. Each anecdote is animated to exaggeratively visualize the absurd incidents.

all_concepts.title: Rapid Fire Reality Check
all_concepts.description: An interactive quiz format where viewers answer coding quiz questions in seconds, showcasing how typical code reviews get slowed down and morphed into endless loops. See AI expedite misunderstood paths alongside team reactions!

all_concepts.title: Escape the Code Dungeon
all_concepts.description: Developers are stuck in a metaphorical dungeon representing the slow code reviews, casting an engaging escape journey filled with traps—all representing common code review pitfalls. They ultimately find their key to freedom via the AI tool.

all_concepts.title: Voiceover Battles: AI vs. Developers
all_concepts.description: What do developers really think about their code reviews? Record alarming truth bombs juxtaposed with logical AI rebuttals, paving the way for a peaceful coding partnership. An ‘adversarial comedic’ take on duo's banter.

all_concepts.title: 100 Code Review Errors in Under 60 Seconds
all_concepts.description: Fast-paced and visually reactive, outline the outlandish and astounding continuation of unacceptable PR issues in a light-hearted presentation, wrapping up with an eye-popping reveal of how the AI tool is this silent hero in reviews.

pain_point: Traditional A/B testing is ineffective due to guesswork, biases, and the complexity of scaling tests across multiple segments, leading to inefficient marketing efforts.
concept_description: A quirky competitive video where two marketers use their old-fashioned A/B testing methods while a third, with Eikona, appears to orchestrate a flawless marketing symphony. The contrast highlights the inefficiency versus the seamless magic of Eikona's solutions.
concept_hook: A dramatic symphony of mistakes—one marketer dramatically fails as they struggle with manual techniques while another shines with easy precision.

scenes.visual: A split screen showing two marketers on the left side chaotically sifting through piles of paper notes and charts; one is sweating and outright panicking while trying to plug cables into an outdated computer. The right side displays a calm and composed marketer using Eikona on a sleek tablet, relaxing with a cup of coffee while everything around them is automated and simple.
scenes.camera: Static shot showing both setups
scenes.action: Marketers on the left struggle while the one on the right smiles effortlessly
scenes.dialogue: [Narrator saying] 'Witness the chaos of old-school testing!'
scenes.on_screen_text: Who will win the A/B battle?

scenes.visual: Close-up of the frantic marketer churning through test results, looking confused and frustrated; numbers and percentages flying around emphasizing the complexity of traditional methods.
scenes.camera: Medium close-up focusing on expressions of despair on left marketer
scenes.action: The left marketer throws papers in the air while looking overwhelmed with manual graphs around them.
scenes.dialogue: 'How can I make sense of all this chaos?'

scenes.visual: The screen shows the marketer on the right joyfully adjusting campaign settings in Eikona, with visual graphs showcasing increasing engagement metrics in real-time. The workflow appears animated and effortless as it highlights automation features.
scenes.camera: Smooth zoom into the screen of Eikona, then cut to the marketer smiling.
scenes.action: The marketer presses a button; graphics animate success metrics soaring up, leading to happy customer feedback.
scenes.dialogue: 'With Eikona, it's all automatic! Impressive targeting, effortless efficiency.'

scenes.visual: Full screen that shifts focus to a sleek Eikona logo with contact information and a call-to-action button below. In the background, silhouettes of the stressed marketer turn cheerful as the Eikona log appears as a central star of the scene.
scenes.camera: Static shot focusing on Eikona's call-to-action
scenes.action: Eloquent animation highlighting Eikona's main benefits like 'Automate. Personalize. Succeed.'
scenes.dialogue: 'Time to elevate your marketing strategies! Try Eikona today.'

audio.sfx: final flourish with applause sound effect

all_concepts.title: The Marketing Maestro Battle

all_concepts.title: Time Travelers of Marketing

all_concepts.title: AI vs Human: The Ultimate Ad Challenge

all_concepts.title: The Roller Coaster of Guesswork

all_concepts.title: The Influencer with a Twist

all_concepts.title: The Marketing Time Sink

all_concepts.title: The AI Guardian Angel
all_concepts.description: A light-hearted narrative where a developer is overwhelmed by various tech challenges, but an AI avatar appears as a 'guardian angel' using Mistral AI, solving issues in real-time with whimsical solutions and humorous commentary.

all_concepts.title: Reality vs. AI Fantasy
all_concepts.description: A quirky split-screen video contrasting utopian AI deployment scenarios with the often chaotic real-life struggles developers face when using traditional AI solutions.

all_concepts.title: Behind the Data Screens
all_concepts.description: An inspiring mockumentary style that follows a fictional organization as they try to implement AI, showcasing all the chaos, laughs, and breakthroughs while Mistral AI quietly delivers amazing results in the background.

all_concepts.title: Custom Configurations Challenge
all_concepts.description: Gamify the video by setting up a humorous competition between developers to see who can come up with the craziest customized AI configuration to solve fictitious, ridiculous problems using Mistral AI.

all_concepts.title: Data Control Duel
all_concepts.description: An engaging commentary where two developers ‘battle’ it out, demonstrating secure data usage and flexible configurations offered by Mistral AI with humorous jabs and puns about data management.

all_concepts.title: The Secure AI Conveyor Belt
all_concepts.description: A playful metaphor where AI deployments are visualized as products on a conveyor belt, transforming chaotic unrefined projects into polished, perfectly functional AI models thanks to Mistral AI's customization.

all_concepts.title: The Frequency of Feedback
all_concepts.description: A quirky jam session where various professionals make 'AI beat' and provide laughter and shock-value intel on what feedback sounds like when using inadequately deployed AI, until a seamless performance with Mistral AI transitions.

all_concepts.title: Who Are You Calling a Robot?
all_concepts.description: Satirical narrative where people in an office first think that Mistral AI is just another faceless software, but it reveals its endearing 'personality' as users interact with its intuitive features, showcasing the ease and customization.
